structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.catch_line: Kentucky Multidisciplinary Commission on Child Sexual Abuse.

text.section: The Kentucky Multidisciplinary Commission on Child Sexual Abuse is hereby created.
Appointees shall serve at the pleasure of the appointing authority but shall not serve longer than four (4) years without reappointment.
The commission shall elect a chairperson annually from its membership.
